栢字的基本解释

栢
bǎi
同“柏1”。

栢字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bǎi］
［《廣韻》博陌切，入陌，幫。］
亦作“栢1”。
(1)柏科植物的通称。有侧柏、圆柏、刺柏、台湾扁柏、福建柏等多种。常绿乔木或灌木。叶小，鳞片形。果实卵形或圆球形。性耐寒，经冬不凋。木质坚硬，纹理致密，可供建筑、造船等用。
(2)指柏叶。
(3)特指柏台。
(4)古国名。参见“柏國”。
(5)通“伯”。大。
(6)通“伯”。古代官、爵名。
(7)通“箔”。
(8)通“迫”。逼近，贴近。
(9)姓。汉有柏始昌。见《汉书·西南夷传》。
[②]［bò］
见“黄柏”。

栢字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　栢； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页523第01
俗柏字。

栢字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
栢字的起名意思

木名，柏树。

Cypress
Basic explanation of words
Cypress
bǎi
Same as "Bai 1".
Cypress
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bǎi］
["Guang Yun" Bo Mo cut, enter Mo, help. ]
Also known as "Bai 1".
(1) Generic term for Cupressaceae. There are many kinds of arborvitae, juniper, juniper, Taiwan cypress, Fujian cypress and so on. Evergreen trees or shrubs. The leaves are small and scaly. The fruit is ovoid or spherical. It is hardy and will not wither through winter. The wood is hard and dense, and can be used for construction and shipbuilding.
(2) Refers to cypress leaves.
(3) Especially refer to Baitai.
(4) Ancient country name. See "Bai Guo".
(5) Through "Bo". Big.
(6) Through "Bo". Ancient official and noble names.
(7) Pass "foil".
(8) Through "force". Close, close.
(9) Last name. There was Bai Shichang in the Han Dynasty. See "Han Shu · Southwest Yi Biography".
[②]［bò］
See "Cork".
